core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Productivity (Structure) with Cyber-Flow (Fluidity).
Emotion First: The app must feel like entering a 'Flow State' - frictionless, deep, focused.
Content is King: Tasks are the heroes. Everything else frames them.
Zoom In: Focus on the immediate next step (The 'Now' view).
Negative Space: Use deep dark space to let the glowing content breathe.
anti_patterns: No boring symmetrical grids. Use the Bento/Tetris grid.
No flat gray cards. Use depth, borders, and subtle glows.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Follow the 'Anti-AI' persona. Do not build a generic dashboard. Make it moody, deep, and electric.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_setup: Force dark mode by default in tailwind.config.js or App.tsx.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Use Shadcn components but strip the default 'zinc' styling. Inject the 'Electric Indigo' and 'Neon Emerald' colors.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: Implement the 'Daily Flow Map' using a creative visualization (e.g., a timeline or a radial progress), not just a list.
instructions_to_main_agent.ai_assistant: The AI chat should feel like a 'holographic' overlay. Use glassmorphism.
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Use framer-motion for smooth entry of tasks. Don't just pop them in.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
